title: Runes
body: So, with the new runes coming out i got some questions. Since i don't like all the preset runes riot made for us and would like to make my own with some changes, can u change your runes in game. Becasue what i would like to do is just edit my runes in game after i pick becasue i can change runes fast

replies.body:
You can edit your runes in champ select if you like, both before and after you pick a champion.

The preset pages are there for people that want to use them, either as they are or as a suggested starting point. If you don't want to use them at all there's no obligation to and we'll be adding an option to hide them from view entirely for people that want to do that.
